doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Habibur Rahman
doctor.workplace: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Habibur Rahman is a Pediatric Nephrologist in Dhaka. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Pediatrics), MD (Pediatrics Nephrology). He is a Professor, Pediatric Nephrology at Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Central Hospital, Dhanmondi. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Habibur Rahman at Central Hospital, Dhanmondi is 4pm to 8.30pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: House # 02, Road # 05, Green Road, Dhanmondi, Dhaka - 1205

doctor.name: Dr. Syed Saimul Haque
doctor.degree: MBBS, MD (Child Kidney), Clinical Fellow (Child Kidney Diseases)
doctor.workplace: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Syed Saimul Haque is a Pediatric Nephrologist in Dhaka. His qualification is MBBS, MD (Child Kidney), Clinical Fellow (Child Kidney Diseases). He is a Associate Professor, Pediatric Nephrology at Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Labaid Specialized Hospital, Dhanmondi. Practicing hour of Dr. Syed Saimul Haque at Labaid Specialized Hospital, Dhanmondi is 6pm to 9pm (Closed: Thu & Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Abdullah Al Mamun
doctor.degree: MBBS, MD (Pediatric Nephrology), Fellow - ISPD (Bangalore, India)
doctor.workplace: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Abdullah Al Mamun is a Pediatric Nephrologist in Dhaka. His qualification is MBBS, MD (Pediatric Nephrology), Fellow - ISPD (Bangalore, India). He is a Assistant Professor, Pediatric Nephrology at Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at BRB Hospital, Dhaka. Practicing hour of Dr. Abdullah Al Mamun at BRB Hospital, Dhaka is 6pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Afroza Begum
doctor.degree: MBBS (DU), FCPS (Child), MD (Child Kidney), FRCP (UK), WHO Fellow (AIIMS, Delhi)
doctor.workplace: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Afroza Begum is a Pediatric Nephrologist in Dhaka. Her qualification is MBBS (DU), FCPS (Child), MD (Child Kidney), FRCP (UK), WHO Fellow (AIIMS, Delhi). She is a Chairman, Dept. of Pediatric Nephrology at Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Monowara Hospital (Pvt) Ltd.. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Afroza Begum at Monowara Hospital (Pvt) Ltd. is 5pm to 8pm (Sunday to Saturday) (Except National Holidays).

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Golam Muin Uddin
doctor.specialty: Child Diseases Specialist & Pediatric Nephrologist/Child Kidney Specialist
doctor.workplace: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Golam Muin Uddin is a Pediatric Nephrologist in Dhaka. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Pediatrics), FRCP (Edinburgh, UK). He is a Ex. Chairman & Professor, Pediatric Nephrology at Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Anwer Khan Modern Diagnostic Centre, Banani. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Golam Muin Uddin at Anwer Khan Modern Diagnostic Centre, Banani is 10am to 12pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.hospital: Anwer Khan Modern Diagnostic Centre, Banani
chamber.address: Plot: 11, Road: 11, Block: G, Flat: 1/A (1st & 2nd Floor), Banani, Dhaka

doctor.name: Dr. Tarannum Khondaker
doctor.degree: MBBS, MCPS (Paediatrics), FCPS (Paediatrics), FCPS (Paediatric Nephrology), IPNA Fellow (Bangalore, India)
doctor.info: Dr. Tarannum Khondaker is a Pediatric Nephrologist in Dhaka. Her qualification is MBBS, MCPS (Paediatrics), FCPS (Paediatrics), FCPS (Paediatric Nephrology), IPNA Fellow (Bangalore, India). She is a Associate Professor, Paediatric Nephrology Department at Bangladesh Shishu Hospital & Institute. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at SIBL Foundation Hospital & Diagnostic Center. Practicing hour of Dr. Tarannum Khondaker at SIBL Foundation Hospital & Diagnostic Center is 5pm to 8pm (Sat, Mon, Tues, Wed).

chamber.address: Fattah Plaza, 70, Green Road, Panthapath, Dhaka - 1205
